string.text: I'm hurt damn it, don't you see that? I need a medkit or at least a bandage.
Thanks bro', I won't forget it.
So how do you go around the Zone then? What if you're infected or something? You won't even be able to cure yourself!
Heh, bad luck, man. Sorry but if I give you mine I won't have any left for myself.
It's your business, dude, but it doesn't do you any credit.
Help me out dude, would you?
